mapper.select: SELECT B.BNO, BTITLE, BC.CCONTENTS, BC.CDATE FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARDCOMMENT BC ON(B.BNO = BC.BNO) WHERE B.BTNO = 2 AND REVIEW = 'Y' AND CSTATUS = 'Y' AND BC.USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY BC.CDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDCOMMENT WHERE CSTATUS = 'Y' AND REVIEW = 'Y' AND USERID = #{userId}
SELECT L.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.USERID, LDATE FROM LIKELIST L JOIN BOARD B ON(L.BNO=B.BNO) WHERE L.USERID = #{userId} AND B.BSTATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY LDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKELIST L JOIN BOARD B ON(L.BNO=B.BNO) WHERE B.BSTATUS = 'Y' AND L.USERID = #{userId} GROUP BY L.USERID
SELECT O.ONO, O.ORDERINFO, P.EARN, P.USE, P.PDATE FROM POINT P JOIN ORDERINFO O ON(O.ONO=P.ONO) WHERE P.USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY P.PDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POINT P JOIN ORDERINFO O ON(O.ONO=P.ONO) WHERE P.USERID = #{userId} GROUP BY P.USERID
